Detailed Description

Helper for alarm configuration plugins Selects the current alarm system to be edited by all alarm configuration plugins.

The class CAlm_sys_select provides a method so that all of the alarm system configuration plugins edit the same system, as well as giving a common presentation to the plugins.

As this class is based upon a QWidget, it also provides the display, so needs to be on the screen.

It is suggested that when a plugin is made active it does requests a directory listing from the server using "emit command( "dir", "config/alarms");" this will ensure that any changes made by other people are picked up.

bool CAlm_sys_select::setSystemNames (  QString  sNames  ) 
 

The function CAlm_sys_select::setSystemNames(QString sNames) should be called on the reply from "emit command( "dir", "config/alarms");" with the error message being the value passed as sNames.

Signal issued when the user selects a different system, note that this is only issued to the current plugin.
